title: Maintenance
body: Because of maintenance everyone was kicked from the game. Now that maintenance is over I tried to play another game but it seems to think I'm still in that previous game. I comes up with the reconnect button if I click on that it still doesn't allow me to rejoin the game. Is there anyway I can fix this to start a new game? Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm going to assume this is already resolved by now.

What you experienced is known as a "Ghost Game", these occur when the proper "end game" message is not correctly communicated to your client, normally these resolve themselves within 24 hours. (At most)
i'm currently experiencing the same issue, i think riot has to manually fix it.
